titleStmt.title: Private Receipt for Payment in Kind
titleStmt.author: Aurelius Ptolemaios [- - -], bouleutes

revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: Has measured [- - -, son/daughter] of Antonius, [- - -] eighteen [- - -] artabai [of wheat], total 18 [- -] artabai of wheat. I, Aurelius Ptolemaios, [son of - - -(?)], councillor, have signed. And likewise, (- - -?) the same has measured [- - - artabai] of wheat, which are for the harvest [of year . . . while I retain] my claim to the [other debts you owe me]. Year 13 of Lucius Septimius Severus Pius and Marcus Aurelius Antoninus Augusti, month day].

listBibl.bibl: Sijpesteijn PJ, ZPE 109, 102-103, 1995, Pl. XIV -- SB XXII, 15862 -- L. 1-2: read: emetre[se]n [- - -] ; Antoni[o]u . [- - - ktl., rather than: [emetre[se]n [N.N. (etous) 13 Seouerou kai] ; Antoni[no]u t[on kyrion ktl. (PH)
